name: places/ChIJ1zB-OMFYwokRdw-5Jk9pNoY
formattedAddress: 430 E 72nd St #1, New York, NY 10021, USA
adrFormatAddress: 430 E 72nd St #1, New York, NY 10021-4607, USA

originalText.text:
Be aware people here can be rude. I went in and ask for pricing. I asked how much for a sweater wash, and a pricing sheet. You know most places list their pricing on the wall for fairnes. The lady told me they don’t have a pricing sheet, and if I don’t like it, I can go somewhere else. She repeated a couple times “you can go somewhere else”. I said of course I can go somewhere else. I can go anywhere I want. She didn’t have to tell me.
Over the years, I never received friendly service. Always it’s okay service or rude. I go occasionally just for convenience. I’ll stop going now.

originalText.text: I recently had an exceptional experience at Knickerbocker 72 Cleaners! Their dry cleaning service was top-notch, leaving my clothes looking fresh and pristine. The staff was friendly and attentive, ensuring my garments were handled with care. I'm delighted with the results and highly recommend this place to anyone in need of reliable dry cleaning services. Kudos to Knickerbocker 72 Cleaners for a job well done!

originalText.text:
Shrunk a jumper they sent for 'dry cleaning' to less than half its size, took it back for them to stretch it back into shape, now it's juts misshapen.
Take clothes here if you want them shrunk.

originalText.text: They were so quick to fix my coat zipper and did a great job.

text.text: They were so quick to fix my coat zipper and did a great job.

originalText.text:
If you are searching for a reliable cleaners, I recommend this place. They’ve been here for a while and are loyal with their service. I have been using them for four years and they treat me like family.

The Tailor’s professional skill is well known in this area. I am recommending this place from my personal experience.

This cleaners will brighten your day and clothes! Once again, I recommend!!
